description: Migrates data from phpBB to JForum including users, posts, private messages, and forum structure
Imports user accounts from phpBB to JForum with all profile data and settings
Transfers forum posts from phpBB to JForum with text formatting conversion
Migrates private messages between users from phpBB to JForum
Transfers categories, forums, topics and related forum structure data
Configures user permissions and group relationships in the JForum system
Prepares JForum database by cleaning target tables before migration
Converts phpBB formatting codes to JForum compatible markup using regex patterns
